Reviews.Title: I felt robbed !! WHY?
Reviews.Author: Caucasian
Reviews.Content: Because this camera did the better than or as good as the same job my several hundred bucks camera. I bought this for my mom who just wanted to have a simple camera to make some special days memorable to herself and before her I tried several shots myself to teach her how to use it. I was so surprised at the clarity of the photos I took. One of my friends had it and had told me that it was so good and I was suspicious about her comment as I always thoght some higher brands were always better. But now I found out I was wrong. No need to empty your pocket to take a good picture. This good value one does that job very well. Apparently Fuji is able to surprise photo enthusiasts.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Gary Parlato

logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo33CI96XFGE7LBcurrentClick) { return cv_mo33CI96XFGE7LBcurrentClick(); } } } Length:: 8:43 MinsI think this is a nice camera. It will take me a long time to get around to learning everything you can do with it. So far i have not had one blurred picture. It has so many different settings on it for different shots you can use. It has special features for just face shots, night scenery, text shots for close ups and a lot more. I am using it in auto-mode most of the time. The panorama shots are great. When i use text setup i can get good shots of text on those little bitty manuals with the small print.

Reviews.Title: arrived defective
Reviews.Author: Don Erickson "Dieter"
Reviews.Content: We never got to use the camera.  It arrived defective.  The camera kept reading low battery even when we replaced the batteries four times.  The camera would not take a photo.  We have returned it to the seller and are waiting for a replacement to be sent.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera
Reviews.Author: Jessie Cresencia
Reviews.Content: tech specifications are reasonable for non professional photographer  and it takes good pictures crisp clear, iwould recommend to friends

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: cafe2230
Reviews.Content: this is really good product that come to save my life and businessI do bakery, and I need a camera for all my jobs, on Sunday my camera broke and I need a new one, by the weekend, I purchased this one on Monday and arrived by Friday.. just save my life in the last minutevery easy to use and incredible high quality pictures... now my cakes look amazing in every shoot.. for a really inexpensive camera.

Reviews.Title: Practical and Lightweight
Reviews.Author: Bloomingrose "Rose Jones"
Reviews.Content: Gets the job done! Easy to use, easy to focus. I know nothing about photography and this meets my needs as an eBay seller.

Reviews.Title: Fuji Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: DJG
Reviews.Content: This is so small it easily fits in your shirt pocket. I  really like the size and weight, I just need to take more pictures.  I would recommend this anyone.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied!
Reviews.Author: Madhu N. Reddy
Reviews.Content: We wanted a inexpensive camera to carry along our trips. This camera fits the bill perfectly. After using it for about month or so, we are satisfied with the purchase. This camera takes crisp pictures. Though zoom is bit desirable anything in the range this camera takes very good pictures. Only negative we felt was it was sort of slow going from picture to picture. There seems to be short wait period between pictures. Other than that this a perfect little camera even your 5 year old can handle pretty well. If you are tight on budget this would be right a right choice.

Reviews.Title: Great for the low price
Reviews.Author: GC
Reviews.Content: I bought this for when I don't want to carry my SLR. Fits in my pocket and takes good quality pics with fast recycle time. I did have a bit of a problem as others reported when first starting the camera out of the box. Once I was able to set the camera for rechargable batteries and used some high quality rechargable AA's, it has worked perfectly. It outperforms cameras of my friends that spent double for theirs.

Reviews.Title: Perfect size
Reviews.Author: JOSEPH J ROSS
Reviews.Content: After retirement I no longer needed a camera for work so I sold my camera gear and bought this camera for everyday use.  It works just fine for my needs.

Reviews.Title: If memory card is required, this should be stated up front.
Reviews.Author: End User "EndUser"
Reviews.Content: This camera seems like it will be very nice. But I don't know yet because it actually requires a memory card (to be purchased separately). Had I known this I would have ordered the two together. I ordered this camera after our camera at my place of work was lost. We waited for the package to arrive because we had some items we really needed to get online quickly. So it is very disappointing to learn that the camera actually does not work without a card. I could have saved a lot of time if this had been pointed out clearly in the ad. It's sort of like selling candles - that need the wicks purchased separately in order to burn. I would expect a digital camera to at least hold a few pics so we could upload them. I am ordering the memory card now. :(

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: parklane
Reviews.Content: This was my second fuji point & shoot. The first one was a finepix JX and was quite happy with it until the lens wouldnt extend. So I bought the AX500. Immediately noticed the lower quality case & look of it. This model uses AA batteries, which there is pros & cons to that. The picture quality was bad. My 5 year old phone takes better pictures. Weird shadow with flash. I sent it right back.

ProductInfo.Features:
14MP
2.7-inch LCD Screen Size
Image Stabilization/Face Detection/Blink Detection/Smile Detection/Red Eye Reduction/Panoramic Stitching
Web Mode with YouTube and Facebook easy-to-use upload
Batteries: 2 x AA Batteries included and accepts SD/SDHC Memory Cards
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm Finepix AX500 Digital Camera, 14 Megapixel, 5x Optical/6.7x Digital Zoom, 2.7" LCD Display, Black
